references.paper_title: Deep reinforcement learning at the edge of the statistical precipice
references.reason: This paper discusses the limitations of deep reinforcement learning, which is relevant to the current research on improving sample efficiency in RL.

references.paper_title: Dream to control: Learning behaviors by latent imagination
references.reason: This paper introduces the Dreamer model, which is a key component of the proposed method.
This paper introduces the concept of world models for reinforcement learning, which is a foundation of model-based RL.
This paper is highly influential for its introduction of intrinsic motivation and exploration strategies for unsupervised learning.

references.paper_title: Diversity is all you need: Learning skills without a reward function
references.reason: This paper discusses methods for learning skills without external rewards, which is relevant to the topic of unsupervised reinforcement learning.
